Bitcoin: What You Need To Know Before You Buy?

Bitcoin is a digital currency introduced in 2009. Introduced by pseudonymous and mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto. Bitcoin has no physical presence and is only kept on a public ledger that is transparent and accessible to everyone. It is the most popular and has triggered the launch of many other cryptocurrencies. Before you get started with Bitcoin, […]
